channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoho Forms -- Zoho Forms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoho Forms -- Zoho Forms

item.title: CVE-2024-47633|2024-10-07T13:20:35.432Z -- zoho%20forms -- zoho%20forms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Zoho Forms allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Zoho Forms: from n/a through 4.0.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Zoho Forms allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Zoho Forms: from n/a through 4.0.
